document_description: As envisaged in the Energy Policy Framework (2005), the government has regularly updated the Climate Plan (2004, 2006, 2009, 2011), with the last update published in June 2014, integrating recent EU legislation. The Climate Plan covers nine Action Areas: Transport Residential tertiary Industry and energy generation Agriculture Forestry Waste Exemplary role of the state and territorial authorities Businesses Research For each category, the Plan summarises targets and objectives set through different climate and energy related legislation as well as EU legislation, and evaluates the achievements to date.
